title: Development charges and premium shall not be recovered for any relaxations in open spaces, exclusion of staircase, lift and lobby areas from FSI computation & for Fungible compensatory area as per Regulation No
clause_text: Development charges and premium shall not be recovered for any relaxations in open spaces, exclusion of staircase, lift and lobby areas from FSI computation & for Fungible compensatory area as per Regulation No. 31(3) for BUA to be handed over to MCGM.
